entry.title: LKWH-2 (sherpa headband)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Headbands
Price: 36.00

COMES IN 4 COLORS (PACK OF 4)
The perfect winter headbands for running, hiking, cross-country skiing and snowshoeing. Wear our coziest headbands with an undeniably Nordic flair.  This headband is the ultimate in cozy comfort, warm and breathable for perfect extra fall & winter weather coverage. 
Fabric & Care
  • Shell is made of 100% Wool.
  • Fleece Lining.
  • Machine wash, line dry.
  • Stays warm when wet and naturally resists odors.
  • Azo free dyes.
  • One size fits all.

    •  

    Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
